column3: â€œThe first thing you notice with this weed is the beautifully overwhelming smell of root beer. That's the only smell you get from it. Next is taste. I'm waiting for my vaporizer to arrive in the mail, so I did my first session with RB Kush through a pipe. I will do a re-review with the Vaporizer. Anyways, even from smoking, I sill got an unexpected surprise. I was expecting a nice root beer smell and more earthy taste...â€

However, the delicious kush-y undertones are highlighted by sweetest notes of vanilla ğŸ’¥ â€” so taste + flavor do compensate a bit! Itâ€™s definitely a mind-booster, creativity-wise, & the...â€

â€œThis weed is good beyond all conception.  This ridiculously dank, though unbelievably smooth, bud will get you incredibly high.  I smoked 11 bowls, the majority of which were vaporized, and it tasted so perfect, hit as smoothly as a 300 bong, and produced a lot of body buzz.â€
â€œSweet but earthy, good buzz alot is a little too much and your in for a nice nap.but a good wake n bake!â€
â€œVery cerebral but not heavy on the mind. I find it to be very uplifting and very good for daytime. Plus the rootbeer aromas are a wonderful surprise.â€

â€œIt is absolutely amazing how much this strain smells like rootbeer. It quite literally smells like it was drenched in rootbeer syrup. Subtle Kush notes are found underneath. The strain feels like an indica and provides you with mild euphoria, nothing overpowering. A very very odd yet good rootbeer taste is strongly present in the smoke. The effects hit you quite quickly and you will instantly notice that this is simi...â€

â€œBoo, loses a half mark from me for being a spray on substance. Hows it listed as a strain when the root beer taste is added? At least there should be a disclaimer mentioning that. Still tastes great though, dont get me wrong, but was much cooler when i thought it grew like that .â€

â€œTHE tastiest bud I've ever come across with that very distinct, sweet vanilla flavor.  I can't wipe the Bill and Ted's Excellent Adventure smile from my face, and I like it!  The high doesn't bog you down one bit though.

Good morning medicine to get your head in the game for the day ahead, great for anxiety and depression and it has a nice little kick to it that is helpful when that morning coffee just isn't cutting...â€

â€œBoo, loses a half mark from me for being a spray on substance. Hows it listed as a strain when the root beer taste is added? At least there should be a disclaimer mentioning that. Still tastes great though, dont get me wrong, but was much cooler when i thought it grew like that .â€

â€œSweet earthy vanilla vapor that lingers around awhile and keeps your taste buds just begging for more! Pain melts away and stress levels taper off as it takes hold slowly. Indica? Sativa? Imagine a Root Beer Dream...yeah, its that good! Great flower for both novice and veterans if you can find it!â€

â€œVery nice relaxed feeling. Extremely colorful bud with vibrant purple hues. One of the best strains I've had out here in Springfield.â€
â€œJust a giant YES BITCHES!â€
â€œVerry resinous high mellow smooth smokeâ€
â€œExtraordinary root beer/bubblegum smell and taste.â€

â€œVery nice! Good bud for zoning out to video games or creative activities like music/drawing. Tastes wonderful. Rootbeerish for sure. As for the reviewer saying the bud is sprayed? Lol maybe YOUR supplier does that. Has nothing to do with the strain.â€
â€œThis energizes and makes me creative! Perfect for morningsâ€
â€œGreat for wake and bake :)â€

â€œNOPE. 

I consider myself to be a pretty seasoned smoker, and I had a joint of this leftover from some time ago. Now I know why it was left over.

It smelled great and tasted good, but the effects on me were not so great. It caused me to feel isolated, withdrawn, and underscored my â€œselectively socialâ€ tendencies rather than blurring them into the background. 

As a result, not a strain for me. I would recommend mind...â€

â€œPretty amazing that theres a plant with root beer charactaristics. I dont understand how. Anyways this smells and tastes of rootbeer. Its unmistakable. Like a dessert bud. Id keep this around as a treat. Its good. Nothin magical. But better than average. I feel energetic mentally but nothin overwhelming.â€
â€œSprayed on to create root beer characteristics.â€

â€œVery good Indica body high (pain relief) followed by appetite stimulation and a couple of hours of couch lock" relaxation. It was very good at reducing anxiety and stress. I consumed this strain in BHO form.â€"
â€œStraight up root beer. Nice indica dominant from what I gathered.â€

â€œincredible, the smell and taste isby far one of the most potent ive come across. but it doesnt seem 100% natural. maybe its a technique used in the final flushing stages. its got a strong vanilla and spearamint aroma to it. i pray its not a chemical thing. but it is very smooth velvetty enjoyable smoke. the root beer after taste lasts forever. its a lighter indica not the heaviest hitter but its does pack a punch fo ...â€
â€œSmells so much like root beer it seems fake haha. Pretty unique kush, not the strongest, but good.â€

â€œThe Strain Has A Very Strong Scent Of Vanilla / Cola Cola. The Root Beer After Taste Shows Up After The First Couple Hits. The High On This Strain Is A Very Strong Body High. I Smoked 3 Bowls Before I Left To Go Home & I Could Really Feel The High More When I Got Up And Walked Around, I Recommend This As A Daytime Strain, I Smoked This Last Night & I KO'd Fast When I Got Home, Also Gives You A Good Sleep! Would Recom...â€
